channel.title: ITIS on Recology
channel.description: Recent content in ITIS on Recology

item.title: My little presentation on getting web data through R
item.description: With examples from rOpenSci R packages. p.s. I am no expert at this... Web data from R View more presentations from schamber

item.title: searching ITIS and fetching Phylomatic trees
item.description: I am writing a set of functions to search ITIS for taxonomic information (more databases to come) and functions to fetch plant phylogenetic trees from Phylomatic. Code at github. Also, see the examples in the demos folder on the Github site above.
